comments.author: Matthew S Farmer
comments.content: For learning, I would attempt to prompt and constrain a pre-trained agent like Gemma. The starter notebook can help you with that. Even a well-trained LLM has trouble with deterministic thinking and game-like constraints. This is a hard competition. Don't take my word for it, find the best LLM chat you have access to and attempt to play 20 questions with it.
